text: Monopyle paniculata is a species of plant in the family Gesneriaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests at altitudes of 500-1000m. ==References== * Clark, J.L., Monopyle paniculata. Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador paniculata Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Monopyle paniculata
